sentences.en: " He gave her in requital of all things else which ye had taken from me.
sentences.cn: “ 他把她给了我是为了补偿你们从我手中夺走的一切.

sentences.en: A full requital of his striving pain.
sentences.cn: 这是对他艰苦努力的圆满回报.

sentences.en: He gave her in requital of all things else, which ye had taken from me.
sentences.cn: 他把她给了我是为了补偿你们从我手中夺走的一切。

sentences.en: He gave her requital of all things else which ye had taken from me.
sentences.cn: 他把她给了我是为了补偿你们从我手中夺走的一切.

sentences.en: In requital for, I can promise any your requests.
sentences.cn: 作为报答, 我会答应你的任何请求.

sentences.en: Realize in Maria and Ravi happen in 2 people after the amour between disloyal spouse, they decide to pretend in requital for of a paragraph of extramarital affair.
sentences.cn: 在玛丽亚和拉里意识到发生在二人不忠伴侣间的奸情后，他们决定假装一段婚外情作为报复。

sentences.en: We received food and lodging in requital for ( or of ) our services.
sentences.cn: 我们得到 食宿 作为我们服务的报酬.

sentences.en: What requital can we make for all his kindness to us?
sentences.cn: 我们对他给我们的仁慈,能作些什麽报答 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: the act or an instance of requiting
